a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of urban vs. rural population using at least basic drinking water,
Share of urban versus rural population using at least a basic drinking water source; that is, an improved source within 30
minutes round trip to collect water.
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP) (2024); HYDE (2023);
